# AmlDeploymentEvent

Events when a model deployment happens on ACI or AKS.

|**Resource types**|microsoft.machinelearningservices/workspaces|
|**Categories**|Azure Resources, Audit|

|**Basic log**|No|
|**Ingestion-time transformation**|Yes|
